title: Determining Probability Symbolically
body:
In a particular college class, there are male and female students. Some students have long hair and some students have short hair. Write the symbols for the probabilities of the events for each step. (Note that you cannot find numerical answers here. You were not given enough information ot find any probability values yet; concentrate on understanding the symbols.)
- Let F be the event that a student is female.
- Let M be the event that a student is male.
- Let S be the event that a student has short hair.
- Let L be the event that a student has long hair.
